documents.document: Had my earphones in the full train journey but just realised it stopped playing after a couple of songs. Obviously just enjoyed the silence.
@ajaparker We're getting the odd crisp sunny start, but outweighed by a constant grey. The working year should only be the summer months!
Went to bed early last night for the first time in what feels like forever...to still be absolutely knackered this… https://t.co/NiNKhqyjP2
@mcgregor_ewan Hi, can you pls share to help me raise £5k for @mariecurieuk in memory of my Grandad! Over 125miles… https://t.co/6XGUyTpsXy
@PlainOldDan Sounds sweet, that would be awesome! Will get XD up and running today.
@PlainOldDan Yeah seen that as well. What's the output for client review?
What's the deal with using muse for wireframes? Can they be interactive & what gets exported to send to the client? A folder of HTML files?
Earphones in and get shit done kind of attitude this morning, lets see how long that lasts. No even had a coffee yet.
Absolutely terrible service from @Archers_Sleep! Waited in all day but no delivery. 8 year old now has nothing to sleep on! Avoid!
@chris_kammy Hey, can you pls share my just giving page? Trying to raise £5000 for @mariecurieuk for my Grandad! https://t.co/Q7a7X3YD9S
So that's the youngest enrolled to start school after summer...holy shit! It's almost like I've no control over the aging of my own kids.
@_PT32 why would you say something like that when you surely can't mean it!? Do agree there's a clear change and shift as the albums go on.

A train alongside mine going in the same direction, first thought, 'Yas a race!'.
Insight in to my mentality level this morning. ...we won!
'Kings of Leon: Youth and Young Manhood' kind of mornin'! Bloody love that album.
@create48 All the best with the move! Good luck.
@miksullivan @_PT32 Haha. That's what the sweets came in from the shop. I'm no that bad. You basically just ask for a trough of sweets.
@_PT32 They ones are just bonbons. No the good ones with the powder though, sadly.
When mum's away out so me and the kids go to get a 'wee' sweetie! https://t.co/nj4uB950kN https://t.co/ixqyHWCKpq
Need to train hard for the last & biggest race of #myocrchallenge, 17miles + 400 obstacles. Pls read, donate & share https://t.co/Q7a7X4ge1q
Looking forward to a weekend of food, drink, friends & family instead of running about in the cold & mud! Nice change. #myocrchallenge
@_PT32 Offscreen?
@MarieCurieSCO Morning, any chance you could follow me so I can message you a question? Thanks.
@_PT32 Not going to lie, I was a wreck at that bit!

So mid flow of asking/telling my youngest, can she please just do as she's told, she interrupts me with...
'Calm it Janet'! She's 4.
@ThisisDavina I'm doing #myocrchallenge for a year to raise £5K for @mariecurieuk in memory of my Grandad. Running… https://t.co/yxEnewJmpF
I need to find better ways to spend a Saturday! #tattoo #ink #thightattoo https://t.co/DtoMqu2ciJ https://t.co/siHUTmEwQI
I used to wish I could be a jet setter getting flights to meetings. Now I get loads of flights to meetings...now I wish I was in bed more!

Nothing like a full on 'bag can't stay on your shoulder' sprint for the train in morning to wake you up.
...made it.
@stephenfry I'm doing #myocrchallenge for a year to raise £5K for @mariecurieuk in memory of my Grandad. Pls share https://t.co/Q7a7X3YD9S
Or help me raise £5k for @mariecurieuk @MarieCurieSCO by texting 'MOCR50 £3' to 70070. It'll take you less than a minute. #myocrchallenge
Setting off on 2nd last race of #myocrchallenge 15K + obstacles in freezing temperatures. Pls read, donate & share https://t.co/Q7a7X3YD9S
@ConeAloma We were at The Oakwood.
@C82Design @_PT32 Aye, was being healthy by no getting the bun.
@C82Design It was! Had to take a breather half way through though. Wasn't any way I was leaving any.
@_PT32 There's 2 6oz burgers, 2 big bits of bacon, smothered in cheese and then covered with chilli.
I'm not sure if it is, but I'm classing this as race prep for tomorrow's race. #myocrchall… https://t.co/IfuAatLIUw https://t.co/ibMZHswaD2
1st #myocrchallenge race of the year tomorrow @MCTOUGHGUY! Still way off my £5K target for @mariecurieuk Pls donate https://t.co/Q7a7X3YD9S

Easily the latest run I've ever done. Empty streets and just street lights...
...Aye was totally shitting myself!
Sitting on a plane for 1 1/2 hrs because the doors are frozen & can't lock...great start. Should already be in London...still in Edinburgh.
Morning. Early one this morning, day 2 back to work and headed for London. No ease back in to things?...no?
I love absolutely everything about the @norgramstudio site. Beautiful. https://t.co/El0AxR45ZS

Aaaaaaaannd there it is. The morning commute! It's fine though because everyone at home is still in bed*.
*It's anything but fine!
I love what I do, honest. But I really don't want to go back to work tomorrow. #holidayover
Getting my colour on with some @johannabasford. #christmasgift https://t.co/4cTRexk8mp https://t.co/Rc4t2FCu56

Was too busy drinking and eating last night.
Happy New Year folks!
You know it's that time between Christmas and New Year when you're all ready and waiting to get picked up to go to the pub before 11am.
@nataliekenna_ @wdc_studio Yeah, ours got the chop on Boxing Day last year. This years might get an extra day or 2...tops.
Up at half 7 on Christmas Eve to get a hair cut...seriously. The problems of a busy barber! #yawn #jathros
Another one that was agony but huge thanks to @_dagren. #tattoo #lion #liontattoo https://t.co/w5JlkOywUR https://t.co/zAt2XJlo5M
Leave early in case of traffic... there was no traffic... so just the 2 hours to pass @EDI_Airport then! #commute #meeting
Today is the day I'm going to try and get everything done so that I can hopefully have a quiet end to the week...never actually happens!
@ChrisMoyles Mornin' Chris, can you please share my fundraising tweet to help me raise £5000 for @mariecurieuk in m… https://t.co/LUKHDMOkpv
@PureGym Yeah that's what we did, was over at lunch time. Thanks.
@PureGym Hi, can I take a guest in with me to the gym or do they have to get a day pass?
@studiomister Amazing news mate! So happy for you and the family!

@ac_seventhree How thick we talking? Would happily fight for one around the 15-20mm mark!
Fighting for square meat...showing I'm a Fifer.
@_PT32 Now now Mr Parris, are you just grumpy because you tried to break in to someone's car this morning? Haha.
Caught by every possible red light this morning on the way to the station. Pretty much the polar opposite to the @JKCorden advert. #roadrage
@_PT32 Yeah, I think we've bought all our Christmas sweets a few times now!
@ajaparker Home or away kit? Our lad is getting the away one and I managed to find socks from https://t.co/E6LCcmWRVj they do 12-2.
The moment she realised how high up we we're. #bigwheel #christmasmarket #edinburgh https://t.co/W2PNgsK8Ra https://t.co/qC27QJSp36
A day of getting festive with this lot. #christmasmarket #edinburgh https://t.co/vBnFtmDpO2 https://t.co/Ls0tceVa9M
Done! It's officially Christmas. #christmastree https://t.co/HAmHuZOpfW https://t.co/IIzniTkHQX
I think we've just given up with trying to get a tree that's appropriately sized. #treetak… https://t.co/hZhII4dsBJ https://t.co/Vcy9xPOIoB
A busy (slightly stressful) week means I'm on the Glayva. #needsmust https://t.co/6hSqbyZn2e https://t.co/cT7Go7Q0sA
@ConeAloma Haha! Did you really see me going to Android? https://t.co/ttHSF2ZfOG
The wreath's up...Christmas is coming. #christmasspirit https://t.co/K3wzUuqjyr https://t.co/1EOEzY3etX
By the end of #myocrchallenge for @mariecurieuk I'll have ran over 125miles tackling over 1000 obstacles. Pls donate https://t.co/Q7a7X3YD9S
One of those 'I'm pouring a drink when I get in before I even take off my coat' kind of days!
@MensHealthUK I'm running over 125miles & tackling over 1000 obstacles over a year. To raise £5000 for @mariecurieuk https://t.co/Q7a7X3YD9S

This tweet comes to you from a new iPhone 7 plus, can you tell?
No?
...well what was the bloody point then!?
@e2save I think it's all good now. But will let you know if I have any problems.
@TomActman @NickClement @TheActofMan That's the kids range right there surely!?
@e2save Hi, had messages and emails to say my phone will be delivered today but haven't received any time slot or reference number.
@e2save It won't let me DM as you don't follow me.
@CPWTweets Apparently through E2Save, but it was made out that it was CPW, only knew when seen the pending request on my bank.
@e2save Can I get some clarification around my upgrade? Feel a bit tricked as was lead to believe I was upgrading with @CPWTweets.
@raylupton Upgraded tonight with e2save, but kind of tricked in to it as they made out they were @CPWTweets. Sister company apparently.
Anyone had any experience with e2save for upgrading phone contract?

Starting to feel strangely at home in airports. Not sure if that's a good thing.
Not that I'm in duty free in my pants or anything!
@mariecurieuk Thank you! Love this. Just hope I can reach my target by the end of #myocrchallenge! Long way to go. #GivingTuesday
Another early start for another race, all to raise £5k for @mariecurieuk @MarieCurieSCO. If you have 1 min can you text MOCR50 £3 to 70070.
This is getting insane, our little man is 8 today! So proud of him. #birthdayboy https://t.co/cJ79Q0HV0t https://t.co/RaVGe7iVGL
@ThisisDavina Ahead of speaking to @mariecurieuk, pls help me raise £5k for them in memory of my grandad, pls share https://t.co/Q7a7X3YD9S
Using the last of any grip strength at the OCR UK Championships. #ocr #myocrchallenge https://t.co/LExvv8ZFBW https://t.co/0drHZ0HDPn
On the ninja rings at the OCR UK Championships. #ocr #myocrchallenge https://t.co/1avcjK2mH6 https://t.co/B4xTytHTIG
Worth getting up at 3am! It was hard, but happy to be the proud owner of a UK Championships 2016 finisher medal.… https://t.co/mWOc7svtLc
Who doesn't love branded buns!? #myocrchallenge #OCRUKChampionships https://t.co/ua6QvNUXbW
So, @ocrauk UK Championships was definitely 1 of the hardest races I've done. Gutted that Deano's Rig got the bette… https://t.co/cgpGbhW7rv
Heading off to run the biggest race so far, @ocrauk, for #myocrchallenge in memory of my Grandad. Please donate https://t.co/Q7a7X3YD9S
Not even 6am on a Saturday and I'm waiting to board a flight to compete at the @ocrauk UK Championships. Need to wake up! #myocrchallenge
After #myocrchallenge I'll have ran 125+ miles to raise £5k in memory of my Grandad for @mariecurieuk. Pls donate. https://t.co/Q7a7X3YD9S
Does anyone know any nice and charitable brands/companies that give corporate donations/sponsorship to individual fundraising? #MarieCurie
Less than 48 hrs until the @ocrauk UK championships! Part of #myocrchallenge to raise money in memory of my grandad. https://t.co/Q7a7X3YD9S
Some dramatic stonework. #birmingham https://t.co/38kP526klq https://t.co/mkNvjUb0Za
@ConeAloma @CreamAwards @s2gray That's exactly what it is!
Almost time to get some glad rags on for the @CreamAwards with @s2gray. #TheDrum #CreamAwards2016 #rrdcreative
@raylupton It's mainly good deeds and general assistance to the community so I've always seen them as possibly being charity funded.
@reallorraine It's my 30th birthday today, can you please share this to help me raise money in memory of my Grandad… https://t.co/Tj6ldGcjFV
It's my 30th today & a great gift would be if everyone txt MOCR50 £3 to 70070, help me raise £5k for @mariecurieuk @MarieCurieSCO Pls Share
